title: Sample, ca. 1946
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 15 x 15 cm (5 7/8 x 5 7/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Twill weave in browns and gold. Warp alternates four-ply medium brown yarn, four-ply light brown yarn and wrapped metallic. Weft has bands of two-ply gold yarn paired with flat metallic gold; loosely plied green yarn paired with flat metallic gold; and one shot of chenille yarn in 3/1.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, ca. 1946.
ca. 1946. Medium: synthetic
Technique: 2/2 twill. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-40.
